name: apply_document_changeset
description: Apply batch updates to a document.

file_identifier_for_update.description: The ID of the document to update.

index.description:
The zero-based index in the document's content
                           where the text will be inserted.

location.description: Specifies where to insert the text.

documentStyle.description:
The new document style to apply. The specific
                               structure of this dictionary will depend on how
                               document styles are defined in your system.

list_of_modification_requests.description:
A list of update requests to apply. Each dictionary
in the list must be one of the specified request types. Each request
dictionary typically has a single key identifying the type of request
(e.g., 'insertText'), and its value is a dictionary containing the
parameters for that request. The supported request types and their
structures are:
- InsertTextRequest: Corresponds to a dictionary with an 'insertText' key.

editor_user_id.description: The ID of the user. Defaults to "me".

target_document_id.description: The ID of the document to retrieve. Cannot be empty or whitespace.

suggestion_display_mode.description:
The mode for viewing suggestions.
Common values include "DEFAULT" and "SUGGESTIONS_INLINE". 
If None, the document's existing setting is preserved.

retrieve_tabs_content.description: Whether to include tab content. Defaults to False.

requesting_user_id.description:
The ID of the user performing the action. Defaults to "me".
Cannot be empty or whitespace.

document_title.description: The title of the document. Defaults to "Untitled Document".

author_id.description:
The ID of the user. Defaults to "me".
Must be a non-empty string.
